page.title: 17VILLAGE CENTRE-GROBY
page.content:
The{butchers shop}opened in 1927 but the building is much older than that. It was probably built about three hundred years ago and therefore in the Elizabethan style.
At the front you can see four windows. Inside the shop there are black beams along the ceiling and a big black chimney.
The actual shop is quite small,the butcher having the same amount of room as his customers.
The people who own it now are called Chaplin and Sons. Everyday the butcher has to chop one bullock, six sheep and two pigs into different cuts of meat.
